mapper.select: SELECT BOOK_HAS_ID, BOOK_HAS_PERCENT, T.BOOKCASE_ID, BOOK_ID, T.USER_ID, BOOKCASE_CREATE,BOOKCASE_NAME FROM TBL_USER U JOIN (SELECT BOOK_HAS_ID, BOOK_HAS_PERCENT, H.BOOKCASE_ID, BOOK_ID, H.USER_ID, BOOKCASE_CREATE,BOOKCASE_NAME FROM TBL_BOOK_HAS H JOIN TBL_BOOKCASE C ON H.BOOKCASE_ID = C.BOOKCASE_ID) T ON T.USER_ID = #{userId} AND U.USER_ID = T.USER_ID
